original_title: Sri Lanka imposes MRP for eggs
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An Extraordinary Gazette was issued declaring a maximum retail price for eggs.
The Consumer Affairs Authority has set the maximum retail price for a white egg at Rs.44/- while the price for 1kg is set at Rs.880/-.
The maximum retail price per brown egg is set at Rs.46/-, with the price for 1kg set at Rs.920/-.
